remarks: The vector addition for the final constructed Hilbert space. (Contributed by NM, 21-Jun-2015.)
statement:
hlhilbase.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
hlhilbase.u $e |- U = ( ( HLHil ` K ) ` W ) $.
hlhilbase.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
hlhilbase.l $e |- L = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
hlhilplus.a $e |- .+ = ( +g ` L ) $.
hlhilplus $p |- ( ph -> .+ = ( +g ` U ) ) $.
